name: Permanent Representation of the Turkish Textile and Clothing Exporters Association
goal: Apart from our affiliation to all the major European textile associations such as EURATEX, EUROCOTON, AIUFFASS, CIRFS, etc…., our main task is to enhance the relations of the Turkish manufacturers within the European Institutions and obliges us to maintain very close contacts with the EU Commission (mainly DG Trade, DG Enterprise, DG Competition and DG Taxud) in particular in shaping up the trade policy of EU (anti-dumping inquiries, quota issues and of course all issues of common interests which may arise.) To be able to reach our objectives we also need to be in permanent contact with the European Parliament (MEPs and INTA committee mainly).
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Internal Market, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Bilateral and Multilateral Trade policies (FTAs/CETA/TTIP/PanEuroMed/...); REACH; Competition policies; Trade Defence Instruments; Customs & tarifs policies; ...
